node.text:
The Raviz Kovalam is no doubt a Wedding Destination par excellence with its divine settings, attentive services, unobtrusive technology and array of cuisine options. Memorable weddings get effortlessly made here! 
Check out for more details at http://www.theravizkovalam.com/

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
